ca.mcgill.ecse211.navigation

Class ObstacleAvoidance

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ca.mcgill.ecse211.navigation.ObstacleAvoidance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ObstacleAvoidance
extends java.lang.Thread
    Is used to detect if an object is too close to the robot, it then begins obstacle avoidance. Thread constantly polls data from the ultrasonic sensor. Once the object has been avoided, it returns to the previous process.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Team 2
